meanings.sent1: The small boat was floatable on the calm lake.
meanings.sent2: The rubber duck is a floatable toy for the bathtub.
meanings.sent3: The floatable balloon bobbed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her hopes were floatable, rising and falling with each passing moment.
meanings.sent5: The floatable life jacket kept him safe in the water.

meanings.definition: Able to stay on the surface of a liquid
meanings.sent1: The floatable cork remained on top of the water.
meanings.sent2: The floatable ice cubes kept the drink cold without sinking.
meanings.sent3: The floatable leaf drifted lazily along the stream.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were floatable, never sinking into obscurity.
meanings.sent5: The floatable oil slick spread across the surface of the ocean.

meanings.sent1: The floatable material was perfect for making a raft.
meanings.sent2: The floatable pool noodles provided support in the water.
meanings.sent3: The floatable rubber ducky made bath time more fun.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were floatable, carrying her through rough times.
meanings.sent5: The floatable buoy marked the safe swimming area.
